data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Chernivtsi, Ukraine. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chernivtsi, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Chernivtsi, Ukraine to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 27 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 32,777 believers in Chernivtsi to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 904,400 citizens of Chernivtsi, Ukraine, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Pashtun, Southern people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Chernivtsi, Ukraine.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Chernivtsi, Ukraine.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Chernivtsi, Ukraine and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
